DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study to assess the pharmacokinetic profile in patients with active ulcerative colitis and compare it to the experience in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetic Study of LYC-30937 in Subjects With Active Ulcerative Colitis
